Threat: Nature: Loss of CRL distribution point due to hardware failure or a defective component
Countermeasure: Redundant architecture; CRL is hosted on both, geographically separated, web servers

Threat: Employees, Skilled Hacker: Remove or garble CRL for DoS by SSL authentication failure
Countermeasure: The CRL is re-fetched automatically every ten minutes
Additional Countermeasures: Implement monitoring to check the CRL's availability.
